## tykctl ctx

set a value in the provided config file.

### Synopsis

Set config flags using arguments, eg.
		"tykctl ctx org bar"
	will set the variable "org" to "bar"

```
tykctl ctx [flags]
```

### Examples

```
tykctl ctx org bar
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ctx
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.tykctl.yaml)
```
